title: Zoku Naniwa Yuukyouden
synopsis: The Kinshu Group is back to their old antics in this mob comedy. Two new recruits join the gang and try to prove their worth. Things take a turn for the worse with the boss takes a bullet and is hospital ridden. What will happen to the gang as snakes begin to creep to break apart company as if the boss is dead?!
staff: [['Ochiai, Masamune', ['Director']], ['Honda, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Nagao, Hitoshi', ['Art Director']], ['Kogure, Teruo', ['Animation Director']]]
